name: Ghost Knight
description: The Ghost Knight appears as a spectral warrior clad in half plate armor, exuding a menacing presence. It is often seen mounted on its loyal warhorse skeleton, both outfitted for combat.
memorable: The combination of the Ghost Knight's special abilities and its necrotic weapon attacks makes it a challenging enemy, especially when working in tandem with its mount.
goals: To serve as a formidable combatant and protect its surroundings, usually as a guardian of the undead or a cursed location.
relations: Typically seen alongside other undead, especially those it might command or protect.
environment: Often found in dark, eerie locations like graveyards, battlefields, or ancient ruins.
strengths: Includes high armor class, substantial hit points, resistance to necrotic damage, and strong melee capabilities enhanced by its mount.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can exploit its undead nature.
attacks: It can execute multiple melee attacks, utilizing its Battleaxe or Lance with substantial necrotic damage added.
most_powerful_ability: Necrotic Weapons, granting its attacks the ability to deal extra necrotic damage.
equipment: Half plate armor and powerful melee weapons including a Battleaxe and Lance.
senses: The Ghost Knight possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, enhancing its ability to perceive threats in low-light environments.
skills: It excels in Athletics and Stealth, allowing for effective movement and maneuverability in combat.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against effects that would turn undead.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Locked Saddle ensures stability while mounted.
Can issue commands to its mount to enhance combat effectiveness.
